UsageCommitmentPolicy.name: UsageCommitmentPolicy
UsageCommitmentPolicy.description: Represents the set of rules that determines how commitments are applied to a usage resource.

CommitmentRate.description: The rate that’s applicable to the usage resource’s units consumed post the commitment is utilized, but the commitment period is still active.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date and time when the current user last viewed or modified this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and time when the current user last viewed or modified this record.

Name.description: The name of the usage commitment policy.
